00068     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00069     PagingLandScapeData2DManager::PagingLandScapeData2DManager(PagingLandScapeSceneManager * scnMgr,
00070                                                                PagingLandScapeOptions * opt ) :
00071         mScnMgr(scnMgr),
00072         mOptions (opt),
00073         mData2DType (0),
00074         mData2DFormat (""),
00075         mWidth (0),
00076         mHeight (0),
00077         mMaxHeight (0),
00078         mPageManager (0)
00079     {
00080         // Add default texture Types.
00081         registerDataType (new PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightField (this));
00082         registerDataType (new PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldRaw(this));
00083         registerDataType (new PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldTC(this));
00084 #ifndef _MAPSPLITTER
00085         registerDataType (new PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldN(this));
00086         registerDataType (new PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldRawTC(this));
00087         registerDataType (new PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldNTC(this));
00088         registerDataType (new PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldBlendNeighbor(this));
00089 #endif //_MAPSPLITTER
00090         registerDataType (new PagingLandScapeData2D_Spline(this));
00091     }
00092     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00093     PagingLandScapeData2D *PagingLandScapeData2DManager::allocateData2D() const
00094     {        
00095                 assert (!mData2DTypeMap.empty() && mData2DTypeMap[mData2DType]);
00096        return mData2DTypeMap[mData2DType]->newPage();
00097     }    
00098     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00099     PagingLandScapeData2DManager::~PagingLandScapeData2DManager()
00100     {      
00101                 reset();
00102         // for all in map delete.
00103         PagingLandScapeData2DMap::iterator i = mData2DTypeMap.begin();
00104         while (i != mData2DTypeMap.end())
00105         {
00106             delete (*i);
00107             ++i;
00108                 }
00109     }       
00110     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00111     void PagingLandScapeData2DManager::reset()
00112     {
00113                 if (!mActiveData2Ds.empty())
00114                 {
00115                         std::for_each(mActiveData2Ds.begin(), mActiveData2Ds.end(), 
00116                                 std::mem_fun(&PagingLandScapeData2D::unload));
00117 
00118                         // Insert actives into free list
00119                         mFreeData2Ds.insert(mFreeData2Ds.end(), mActiveData2Ds.begin(), mActiveData2Ds.end());
00120                         // Remove all active instances
00121                         mActiveData2Ds.clear(); 
00122                 }
00123 
00124                 // could save a delete if data type is the same... ?
00125                 if (!mData2DPool.empty())
00126                 {
00127                         std::for_each(mData2DPool.begin(), mData2DPool.end(), delete_object());
00128                         mData2DPool.clear();
00129                         mFreeData2Ds.clear();
00130                 }
00131 
00132         mWidth = 0; 
00133         mHeight = 0;
00134     }
00135     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00136     void PagingLandScapeData2DManager::load ()
00137     {        
00138         if (mOptions->data2DFormat != mData2DFormat)
00139         {
00140             reset ();
00141             mData2DFormat = mOptions->data2DFormat; 
00142             unsigned int i = 0;
00143             for (; i != mData2DTypeMap.size(); ++i)
00144             {
00145                 if (StringUtil::endsWith (mData2DTypeMap[i]->getName (), mData2DFormat, false))
00146                 {
00147                     mData2DType = i;
00148                     break;
00149                 }
00150             }
00151             if (i == mData2DTypeMap.size())
00152             {
00153                 OGRE_EXCEPT(Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, 
00154                         "PageData2D not supplied or wrong (check case) !",
00155                                 " PagingLandScapeData2DManager::load");
00156             }
00157         }
00158         WorldDimensionChange();
00159                 mMaxHeight = mData2DTypeMap[mData2DType]->getMaxAbsoluteHeight ();
00160     }    
00161     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00162     bool PagingLandScapeData2DManager::reload(const unsigned int dataX, const unsigned int dataZ)
00163     {
00164 #ifndef _MAPSPLITTER
00165         PagingLandScapeData2D* data = getData2D (dataX, dataZ);
00166         
00167                 data->unload();
00168                 const bool ret = data->load(dataX, dataZ);
00169                 const unsigned int tsize =  mOptions->TileSize;
00170                 const unsigned int psize =  mOptions->PageSize;
00171                 for (unsigned int z = 0; z <= psize ; z += tsize)
00172                 {
00173                         for (unsigned int x = 0; x <= psize ; x += tsize)
00174                         {                       
00175                                 data->adjustDeformationRectangle (x, z);
00176                         }
00177                 }
00178                 return ret;
00179 #else //_MAPSPLITTER
00180         return true;
00181 #endif //_MAPSPLITTER
00182         }
00183         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00184         PagingLandScapeData2D *PagingLandScapeData2DManager::getNewData2D(const unsigned int x, const unsigned int z)
00185         {
00186                 PagingLandScapeData2D *newData2D;
00187                 if (mFreeData2Ds.empty())
00188                 {
00189                         const size_t pool_size = mData2DPool.size ();                   
00190                         const size_t new_pool_size = (pool_size == 0) ? 9 : pool_size * 2;
00191                         mData2DPool.reserve(new_pool_size);
00192                         mData2DPool.resize(new_pool_size);
00193 
00194                         // Create new pages
00195                         for (size_t i = pool_size; i < new_pool_size; ++i)
00196                         {
00197                                 newData2D = allocateData2D();
00198                                 mData2DPool[i] = newData2D;
00199                                 mFreeData2Ds.push_back (newData2D);
00200                         }
00201                 }
00202 
00203                 newData2D = mFreeData2Ds.front ();
00204                 mFreeData2Ds.pop_front ();
00205                 mActiveData2Ds.push_back (newData2D); 
00206 
00207                 newData2D->load (x, z);
00208 
00209                 return newData2D;
00210         }
00211         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00212         void PagingLandScapeData2DManager::releaseData2D(PagingLandScapeData2D *p)
00213         {
00214                 mActiveData2Ds.remove(p);
00215                 mFreeData2Ds.push_back(p);
00216         }
00217         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00218         PagingLandScapeData2D *PagingLandScapeData2DManager::getData2D(const unsigned int x, const unsigned int z,
00219                 const bool alwaysReturn)
00220         {
00221                 if (x < mWidth && z < mHeight)
00222                 {
00223                         PagingLandScapeData2DList::iterator l, lend = mActiveData2Ds.end();
00224                         for (l = mActiveData2Ds.begin(); l != lend; ++l)
00225                         {
00226                                 if ((*l)->isCoord(x, z))
00227                                         return (*l);
00228                         }
00229                         if (alwaysReturn)
00230                                 return getNewData2D(x, z);
00231                 }
00232                 assert (!alwaysReturn);
00233                 return 0;
00234         }
00235     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00236     void PagingLandScapeData2DManager::clear ()
00237     {
00238     }   
00239     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00240     void PagingLandScapeData2DManager::WorldDimensionChange()
00241     {
00242         const unsigned int newWidth = mOptions->world_width; 
00243         const unsigned int newHeight = mOptions->world_height;
00244 
00245                 reset();
00246 
00247         mWidth = newWidth; 
00248         mHeight = newHeight;
00249     }

00251     void PagingLandScapeData2DManager::setPageManager (PagingLandScapeSceneManager *scnMgr)
00252     {
00253         mPageManager = scnMgr->getPageManager();
00254     }        
00255     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00256     bool PagingLandScapeData2DManager::load(const unsigned int dataX, const unsigned int dataZ)
00257     {
00258             PagingLandScapeData2D* data = getData2D ( dataX , dataZ );
00259             if (!data->isLoaded ())
00260             {
00261             return data->load (dataX, dataZ);
00262             }
00263         return true;
00264     }
00265     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00266     void PagingLandScapeData2DManager::unload(const unsigned int dataX, const unsigned int dataZ)
00267     {
00268             PagingLandScapeData2D* data = getData2D ( dataX , dataZ, false );
00269             if (data && data->isLoaded ())
00270             {
00271                         data->unload ();
00272                         releaseData2D (data);
00273             }
00274     }
00275 
00276     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00277     bool PagingLandScapeData2DManager::isLoaded(const unsigned int dataX, const unsigned int dataZ)
00278         {
00279                 PagingLandScapeData2D * const data = getData2D (dataX , dataZ, false);
00280                 return data && data->isLoaded();
00281     }
00282     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00283     const ColourValue PagingLandScapeData2DManager::getCoverageAt(const unsigned int dataX,
00284                                                                 const unsigned int dataZ, 
00285                                                                 const Real x, 
00286                                                                 const Real z)
00287     {
00288         PagingLandScapeData2D* data = getData2D (dataX , dataZ, false);
00289         if (data && data->isLoaded())
00290         {
00291             // TODO check it the terrain height is modified
00292             return data->getCoverage(x, z);
00293         }
00294         return ColourValue::White;
00295     }

00381     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------

00397     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00398     bool PagingLandScapeData2DManager::setHeight(const Vector3 &deformationPoint,
00399         const Real modificationHeight,
00400         const PagingLandScapeTileInfo* info)
00401     {
00402 #ifndef _MAPSPLITTER
00403         const unsigned int pX = info->mPageX;
00404         const unsigned int pZ = info->mPageZ;
00405         const unsigned int pSize = mOptions->PageSize - 1;
00406         // adjust x and z to be local to page
00407         const unsigned int x = static_cast<unsigned int> (deformationPoint.x
00408             - pX * pSize
00409             + mOptions->maxUnScaledX);
00410         const unsigned int z = static_cast<unsigned int> (deformationPoint.z
00411             - pZ * pSize
00412             + mOptions->maxUnScaledZ);
00413 
00414         PagingLandScapeData2D* data = getData2D (pX , pZ, false);
00415         if (data && data->isLoaded())
00416         {
00417             Real heightResult = modificationHeight;
00418             if (data->setHeight (x, z, heightResult))
00419             {
00420                 const unsigned int wL = mOptions->world_width;
00421                 const unsigned int hL = mOptions->world_height;
00422 
00423                 // If we're on a page edge, we must duplicate the change on the 
00424                 // neighbour page (if it has one...)
00425                 const bool left  = (x == 0     && pX != 0);
00426                 const bool right = (x == pSize && pX < wL - 1);
00427                 const bool down  = (z == 0     && pZ != 0);
00428                 const bool up    = (z == pSize && pZ < hL - 1);
00429 
00430                 assert (z <= pSize && x <= pSize);
00431 
00432                 if (left)
00433                 {
00434                     if (down)
00435                     {               
00436                         //  lower left corner 
00437                         data = getData2D (pX - 1, pZ - 1 , false);
00438                         if (data && data->isLoaded())
00439                         {
00440                             data->setHeight (pSize, pSize, heightResult);
00441                         } 
00442                     }
00443                     else if (up)
00444                     {
00445                         //  upper left corner 
00446                         data = getData2D (pX - 1, pZ + 1 , false);
00447                         if (data && data->isLoaded())
00448                         {
00449                             data->setHeight (pSize, 0, heightResult);
00450                         } 
00451                     } 
00452 
00453                     // left
00454                     data = getData2D (pX - 1, pZ, false);
00455                     if (data && data->isLoaded())
00456                     {
00457                         data->setHeight (pSize, z, heightResult);
00458                     } 
00459                 }
00460                 else if (right)
00461                 {
00462                     if (up)
00463                     {
00464                         //  upper right corner 
00465                         data = getData2D (pX + 1, pZ + 1 , false);
00466                         if (data && data->isLoaded())
00467                         {
00468                             data->setHeight (0, 0, heightResult);
00469                         } 
00470                     }
00471                     else if (down)
00472                     {
00473                         //  lower right corner 
00474                         data = getData2D (pX + 1, pZ - 1 , false);
00475                         if (data && data->isLoaded())
00476                         {
00477                             data->setHeight (0, pSize, heightResult);
00478                         } 
00479                     }  
00480                     // right
00481                     data = getData2D (pX + 1, pZ, false);
00482                     if (data && data->isLoaded())
00483                     {
00484                         data->setHeight (0, z, heightResult);
00485                     }  
00486                 }
00487                 if (down)
00488                 {        
00489                     //  lower  (down only)   
00490                     data = getData2D (pX, pZ - 1 , false);
00491                     if (data && data->isLoaded()) 
00492                     {
00493                         data->setHeight (x, pSize, heightResult);
00494                     } 
00495                 }
00496                 else if (up)
00497                 {
00498                     // upper (up only)
00499                     data = getData2D (pX, pZ + 1 , false);
00500                     if (data && data->isLoaded())
00501                     {
00502                         data->setHeight (x, 0, heightResult);
00503                     } 
00504                 }     
00505                 return true;
00506             } // if (data->deformHeight (x, z, heightResult))
00507         } // if (data->isLoaded())
00508         return false;
00509 #else //_MAPSPLITTER
00510         return true;
00511 #endif //_MAPSPLITTER
00512     }
00513     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00514     bool PagingLandScapeData2DManager::deformHeight(const Vector3 &deformationPoint,
00515                                                     const Real modificationHeight,
00516                                                     const PagingLandScapeTileInfo* info)
00517     {
00518 #ifndef _MAPSPLITTER
00519                 const unsigned int pX = info->mPageX;
00520         const unsigned int pZ = info->mPageZ;
00521         const unsigned int pSize = mOptions->PageSize - 1;
00522         // adjust x and z to be local to page
00523         const unsigned int x = static_cast<unsigned int> (deformationPoint.x
00524                                             - pX * pSize
00525                                             + mOptions->maxUnScaledX);
00526         const unsigned int z = static_cast<unsigned int> (deformationPoint.z
00527                                             - pZ * pSize
00528                                             + mOptions->maxUnScaledZ);
00529 
00530                 PagingLandScapeData2D* data = getData2D (pX , pZ, false);
00531                 if (data && data->isLoaded())
00532         {
00533             Real heightResult = modificationHeight;
00534             if (data->deformHeight (x, z, heightResult))
00535             {
00536                 const unsigned int wL = mOptions->world_width;
00537                 const unsigned int hL = mOptions->world_height;
00538 
00539                 // If we're on a page edge, we must duplicate the change on the 
00540                 // neighbour page (if it has one...)
00541                 const bool left  = (x == 0     && pX != 0);
00542                 const bool right = (x == pSize && pX < wL - 1);
00543                 const bool down  = (z == 0     && pZ != 0);
00544                 const bool up    = (z == pSize && pZ < hL - 1);
00545 
00546                 assert (z <= pSize && x <= pSize);
00547 
00548                 if (left)
00549                 {
00550                     if (down)
00551                     {               
00552                         //  lower left corner 
00553                                                 data = getData2D (pX - 1, pZ - 1 , false);
00554                                                 if (data && data->isLoaded())
00555                         {
00556                            data->setHeight (pSize, pSize, heightResult);
00557                         } 
00558                     }
00559                     else if (up)
00560                     {
00561                                                 //  upper left corner 
00562                                                 data = getData2D (pX - 1, pZ + 1 , false);
00563                                                 if (data && data->isLoaded())
00564                         {
00565                            data->setHeight (pSize, 0, heightResult);
00566                         } 
00567                     } 
00568                     
00569                                         // left
00570                                         data = getData2D (pX - 1, pZ, false);
00571                                         if (data && data->isLoaded())
00572                     {
00573                         data->setHeight (pSize, z, heightResult);
00574                     } 
00575                 }
00576                 else if (right)
00577                 {
00578                     if (up)
00579                     {
00580                                                 //  upper right corner 
00581                                                 data = getData2D (pX + 1, pZ + 1 , false);
00582                                                 if (data && data->isLoaded())
00583                         {
00584                            data->setHeight (0, 0, heightResult);
00585                         } 
00586                     }
00587                     else if (down)
00588                     {
00589                                                 //  lower right corner 
00590                                                 data = getData2D (pX + 1, pZ - 1 , false);
00591                                                 if (data && data->isLoaded())
00592                         {
00593                            data->setHeight (0, pSize, heightResult);
00594                         } 
00595                     }  
00596                                         // right
00597                                         data = getData2D (pX + 1, pZ, false);
00598                                         if (data && data->isLoaded())
00599                     {
00600                         data->setHeight (0, z, heightResult);
00601                     }  
00602                 }
00603                 if (down)
00604                 {        
00605                                         //  lower  (down only)   
00606                                         data = getData2D (pX, pZ - 1 , false);
00607                                         if (data && data->isLoaded()) 
00608                     {
00609                         data->setHeight (x, pSize, heightResult);
00610                     } 
00611                 }
00612                 else if (up)
00613                 {
00614                                         // upper (up only)
00615                                         data = getData2D (pX, pZ + 1 , false);
00616                                         if (data && data->isLoaded())
00617                     {
00618                         data->setHeight (x, 0, heightResult);
00619                     } 
00620                 }     
00621                 return true;
00622             } // if (data->deformHeight (x, z, heightResult))
00623         } // if (data->isLoaded())
00624         return false;
00625 #else //_MAPSPLITTER
00626         return true;
00627 #endif //_MAPSPLITTER
00628     }
00629 
00630     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00631     const Real PagingLandScapeData2DManager::getInterpolatedWorldHeight (const Real x, const Real z, Real *getSlopeAt)
00632     {
00633 
00634 #ifndef _MAPSPLITTER
00635       Real heightValue;
00636 
00637                 //#define _DEBUGPOS
00638                 //#define _DEBUGPOSHEIGHTSTICH
00639                 
00640         // scale position from world to page scale
00641         const Real unscaledX = (x / mOptions->scale.x) + mOptions->maxUnScaledX;
00642         const Real unscaledZ = (z / mOptions->scale.z) + mOptions->maxUnScaledZ;
00643         
00644         const Real pSize = mOptions->PageSize - 1;
00645         const Real inv_pSize = 1.0f / pSize;
00646         
00647         //get Page 
00648                 int value = static_cast< int > (unscaledX * inv_pSize);
00649                 const int maxPageX = static_cast< int > (mOptions->world_width);
00650                 const int pageNumberX = (value < 0 ) ? 0 : (value >= maxPageX ? maxPageX - 1: value); 
00651                 const int maxPageZ = static_cast< int > (mOptions->world_height);
00652                 value = static_cast< int > (unscaledZ * inv_pSize);
00653         const int pageNumberZ = (value < 0 ) ? 0 : (value >= maxPageZ ? maxPageZ - 1: value); 
00654                         
00655 
00656                 const PagingLandScapePage * const page = mScnMgr->getPageManager()->getPage (pageNumberX, pageNumberZ, false);          
00657         if (! (page && page->isPreLoaded()))
00658             return 0.0f;
00659             
00660         // adjust x and z to be local to page
00661         const Real localPageX = unscaledX - (pageNumberX*pSize);
00662         const Real localPageZ = unscaledZ - (pageNumberZ*pSize);
00663 
00664             
00665                 const unsigned int tSize = mOptions->TileSize - 1;
00666         const Real inv_tSize = 1.0f / tSize;
00667         
00668         //get Tile
00669                 value = static_cast< int > (localPageX * inv_tSize);
00670                 const int maxNumTiles = static_cast< int > (mOptions->NumTiles);
00671         const int tileNumberX = (value < 0 ) ? 0 : (value >=  maxNumTiles? maxNumTiles - 1: value); 
00672                 value = static_cast< int > (localPageZ * inv_tSize);
00673         const int tileNumberZ = (value < 0 ) ? 0 : (value >=  maxNumTiles? maxNumTiles - 1: value); 
00674         
00675         // adjust x and z to be local to tile
00676         const int localTileX = Math::ICeil (localPageX - tileNumberX * tSize);
00677         const int localTileZ = Math::ICeil (localPageZ - tileNumberZ * tSize);
00678         
00679                                                                 
00680                 #ifdef _DEBUGPOSHEIGHT          
00681                 {
00682                         RenderTarget *t = mOptions->primaryCamera->getViewport()->getTarget ();
00683                         const String debugPos (" px: " + StringConverter::toString(pageNumberX) +
00684                                                                 " pz: " + StringConverter::toString(pageNumberZ) +
00685                                                                 " lpx: " + StringConverter::toString(localPageX) +
00686                                                                 " lpz: " + StringConverter::toString(localPageZ) +
00687                                                                 
00688                                                                 " tx: " + StringConverter::toString(tileNumberX) +
00689                                                                 " tz: " + StringConverter::toString(tileNumberZ) +
00690                                                                 " ltx: " + StringConverter::toString(localTileX) +
00691                                                                 " ltz: " + StringConverter::toString(localTileZ)
00692                                                                 
00693                                                                 );
00694                         t->setDebugText(debugPos);
00695                 }
00696                 #endif // _DEBUG
00697                 
00698 
00699         PagingLandScapeTile * const tile = page->getTile (tileNumberX, tileNumberZ);
00700         bool tileLoaded = tile && tile->isLoaded() && tile->getRenderable();
00701                 const int currentRenderLevel = (tileLoaded) ? 
00702                                                                                         tile->getRenderable()->getRenderLevel() 
00703                                                                                         : 
00704                                                                                         0;
00705                         
00706                         
00707                 
00708                         
00709                 #ifdef _DEBUGPOSHEIGHTSTICH     
00710                 String debugStich (             "(" + StringConverter::toString(pageNumberX) +
00711                                                                 ", " + StringConverter::toString(pageNumberZ) +
00712                                                                 ")(" + StringConverter::toString(tileNumberX) +
00713                                                                 ", " + StringConverter::toString(tileNumberZ) +
00714                                                                 
00715                                                                 ")(" + StringConverter::toString(localPageX) +
00716                                                                 ", " + StringConverter::toString(localPageZ) +
00717                                                                 
00718                                                                 ")(" + StringConverter::toString(localTileX) +
00719                                                                 ", " + StringConverter::toString(localTileZ) +
00720                                                                 
00721                                                                 ") rdl:" + StringConverter::toString(currentRenderLevel)
00722                                                                 
00723                                                                 );
00724                 #endif // _DEBUGPOSHEIGHTSTICH
00725         
00726                         
00727         // find the 4 vertices that surround the point
00728         // use LOD info to determine vertex data spacing - this is passed into the method
00729         // determine vertices on left and right of point and top and bottom
00730         // don't access VBO since a big performance hit when only 4 vertices are needed
00731         
00732         // Step from one vertex to another in the level detail algorithm
00733         const int currentLodStep = 1 << currentRenderLevel;
00734         //const int currentLodStep = 1;
00735         const Real inv_currentLodStep =  1.0f / currentLodStep;
00736                 
00737                 // check if can be on a stitched part of tile   
00738                 const int tileSizeMinuscurrentLodStep = tSize + 1 - currentLodStep;     
00739                 if (tileLoaded &&
00740                         (localTileX <= currentLodStep ||
00741                         localTileX >= tileSizeMinuscurrentLodStep ||
00742                         localTileZ <= currentLodStep ||
00743                         localTileZ >= tileSizeMinuscurrentLodStep))
00744                 {
00745                         
00746                         // get stitching configuration
00747                         PagingLandScapeRenderable * const r = tile->getRenderable();
00748                         PagingLandScapeRenderable * neighbour;
00749                         
00750                         // get each tile LOD and if stitching occurs in this direction.
00751                         neighbour = r->_getNeighbor(NORTH);
00752                         const bool north = (neighbour && neighbour->isLoaded() 
00753                                                                 && neighbour->getRenderLevel() > currentRenderLevel  
00754                                                                 && localTileZ <= currentLodStep);//z-1
00755                                                                 
00756                         neighbour = r->_getNeighbor(SOUTH);
00757                         const bool south = (neighbour && neighbour->isLoaded() 
00758                                                                 && neighbour->getRenderLevel() > currentRenderLevel 
00759                                                                 && localTileZ >= tileSizeMinuscurrentLodStep);//z+1
00760                         assert (north != south || (south == false && north == false));
00761                         
00762                         neighbour = r->_getNeighbor(EAST);
00763                         const bool east = (neighbour && neighbour->isLoaded() 
00764                                                                 && neighbour->getRenderLevel() > currentRenderLevel 
00765                                                                 && localTileX >= tileSizeMinuscurrentLodStep);//x+1
00766                                                                 
00767                         neighbour = r->_getNeighbor(WEST);
00768                         const bool west = (neighbour && neighbour->isLoaded() 
00769                                                                 && neighbour->getRenderLevel() > currentRenderLevel 
00770                                                                 &&  localTileX <= currentLodStep);//x-1
00771                         assert (east != west || (east == false && west == false));
00772                         
00773                         if (north || south || east || west)
00774                         {
00775                         
00776                                 // Interpolate at LOD that uses stitching between tiles if needed.
00777                                 //
00778                                 //        lower LOD
00779                                 //              *-----------*
00780                                 //              |\  \ 3 /  /|
00781                                 //              |1\2 \ / 4/5|
00782                                 //              *--*--*--*--*
00783                                 //                higher LOD
00784                                 //
00785                                 // we iterate over triangle to find which contains the points.
00786                                 // then we launch a ray to triangle intersection query.
00787                                 //
00788                                 // any simpler suggestion welcome. (gladly, this is hell long full of repetition code.)
00789                                 //
00790                                 
00791                                 const Vector2 pos (localPageX, localPageZ);
00792                                 int bottom_right_x,  bottom_right_z;
00793                                 Vector2 a2d, b2d ,c2d;
00794                                 
00795                                 if (north)
00796                                 {
00797                                         bool not_found = true;
00798                                         if (east)//northeast
00799                                         {                       
00800                                                 #ifdef _DEBUGPOSHEIGHTSTICH     
00801                                                         debugStich += " north: " + StringConverter::toString(r->_getNeighbor(NORTH)->getRenderLevel()) +
00802                                                                           " east: " + StringConverter::toString(r->_getNeighbor(EAST)->getRenderLevel());
00803                                                 #endif //_DEBUGPOSHEIGHTSTICH
00804                                                         
00805                                                 // neighbour lod spread
00806                                                 const int neighbour_currentLodStep = 1 << r->_getNeighbor(EAST)->getRenderLevel();
00807                                                 // Step half way between low detail steps
00808                                                 const int halfsuperstep = neighbour_currentLodStep >> 1;                                                
00809                                                 const unsigned long neighbour_lod_mask = ~(neighbour_currentLodStep - 1);
00810                                                 bottom_right_z = static_cast<int>(localPageZ) & neighbour_lod_mask;                                     
00811                                                 const unsigned long lod_mask = ~(currentLodStep - 1);
00812                                                 bottom_right_x = static_cast<int>(localPageX) & lod_mask;
00813                                                 
00814                                                 a2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x + currentLodStep, bottom_right_z);
00815                                                 b2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x,                                  bottom_right_z + halfsuperstep);
00816                                                 c2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x + currentLodStep, bottom_right_z + neighbour_currentLodStep);
00817                                                 
00818                                                 // biggest Middle tri
00819                                                 if (!Math::pointInTri2D (pos, a2d, b2d, c2d))
00820                                                 {
00821                                                         // all other smalls tri up to middle
00822                                                         // but omit first triangle
00823                                                         
00824                                                         // omit first tri 
00825                                                         a2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x,                                  bottom_right_z);
00826                                                         b2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x,                                  bottom_right_z + currentLodStep);
00827                                                         c2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x + currentLodStep, bottom_right_z);
00828                                                         
00829                                                         int step = 1;
00830                                                         while (step < halfsuperstep &&
00831                                                                         !Math::pointInTri2D (pos, a2d, b2d, c2d))
00832                                                         {
00833                                                                 step += currentLodStep;
00834                                                                 
00835                                                                 a2d.y += currentLodStep;
00836                                                                 b2d.y += currentLodStep;
00837                                                         }               
00838                                                         // stops here, not looking after middle of higher lod.
00839                                                         // middle point
00840                                                         if (step < halfsuperstep)
00841                                                                 not_found = false;
00842                                                 }
00843                                                 else
00844                                                 {
00845                                                         not_found = false;
00846                                                 }
00847                                                                                         
00848                                         }
00849                                         else if (west)//northwest
00850                                         {                                                                               
00851                                                 #ifdef _DEBUGPOSHEIGHTSTICH     
00852                                                         debugStich += " north: " + StringConverter::toString(r->_getNeighbor(NORTH)->getRenderLevel()) +
00853                                                                           " west: " + StringConverter::toString(r->_getNeighbor(WEST)->getRenderLevel());       
00854                                                 #endif //_DEBUGPOSHEIGHTSTICH   
00855                                         
00856                                                 // neighbour lod spread
00857                                                 const int neighbour_currentLodStep = 1 << r->_getNeighbor(WEST)->getRenderLevel();
00858                                                 // Step half way between low detail steps
00859                                                 const int halfsuperstep = neighbour_currentLodStep >> 1;                                                
00860                                                 const unsigned long neighbour_lod_mask = ~(neighbour_currentLodStep - 1);                                       
00861                                                 bottom_right_z = static_cast<int>(localPageZ) & neighbour_lod_mask;
00862                                                 const unsigned long lod_mask = ~(currentLodStep - 1);
00863                                                 bottom_right_x = static_cast<int>(localPageX) & lod_mask;
00864                                                 
00865                                                 a2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x,                                  bottom_right_z);
00866                                                 b2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x + currentLodStep, bottom_right_z + halfsuperstep);
00867                                                 c2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x,                                  bottom_right_z + neighbour_currentLodStep);
00868                                                 
00869                                                 // biggest Middle tri
00870                                                 if (!Math::pointInTri2D (pos, a2d, b2d, c2d))
00871                                                 {
00872                                                         //all other small tri
00873                                                         
00874                                                         
00875                                                         a2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x + currentLodStep, bottom_right_z);
00876                                                         b2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x + currentLodStep, bottom_right_z + currentLodStep);
00877                                                         c2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x,                                  bottom_right_z);
00878                                                         
00879                                                         int step = halfsuperstep;
00880                                                         
00881                                                         // begins at middle point
00882                                                         a2d.y += halfsuperstep;
00883                                                         b2d.y += halfsuperstep;
00884                                                         c2d.y += neighbour_currentLodStep;
00885                                                         
00886                                                         while (step < neighbour_currentLodStep &&
00887                                                                         !Math::pointInTri2D (pos, a2d, b2d, c2d))
00888                                                         {
00889                                                                 step += currentLodStep;
00890                                                                 
00891                                                                 a2d.y += currentLodStep;
00892                                                                 b2d.y += currentLodStep;
00893                                                         }
00894                                                         // stops here
00895                                                         if (step < neighbour_currentLodStep)
00896                                                                 not_found = false;      
00897                                                 }
00898                                                 else
00899                                                 {
00900                                                         not_found = false;
00901                                                 }                               
00902                                         }
00903                                         if (not_found)
00904                                         {       
00905                                                 // in north stitching
00906                                                 #ifdef _DEBUGPOSHEIGHTSTICH
00907                                                         debugStich += " north: " + StringConverter::toString(r->_getNeighbor(NORTH)->getRenderLevel());
00908                                                 #endif //_DEBUGPOSHEIGHTSTICH
00909                                                 
00910                                                 // neighbour lod spread
00911                                                 const int neighbour_currentLodStep = 1 << r->_getNeighbor(NORTH)->getRenderLevel();
00912                                                 // Step half way between low detail steps
00913                                                 const int halfsuperstep = neighbour_currentLodStep >> 1;                                                        
00914                                                 const unsigned long neighbour_lod_mask = ~(neighbour_currentLodStep - 1);                                               
00915                                                 bottom_right_x = static_cast<int>(localPageX) & neighbour_lod_mask;                                             
00916                                                 const unsigned long lod_mask = ~(currentLodStep - 1);
00917                                                 bottom_right_z = static_cast<int>(localPageZ) & lod_mask;
00918                                         
00919                                                 a2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x,                                                          bottom_right_z);
00920                                                 b2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x + halfsuperstep,                          bottom_right_z + currentLodStep);
00921                                                 c2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x + neighbour_currentLodStep,       bottom_right_z);
00922                                         
00923                                                 // biggest Middle tri
00924                                                 if (!Math::pointInTri2D (pos, a2d, b2d, c2d))
00925                                                 {
00926                                                         //all other small tri
00927                                                         
00928                                                         // could omit first and last tri ?
00929                                                         int step = 0;
00930                                                         
00931                                                         a2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x,                                  bottom_right_z + currentLodStep);
00932                                                         b2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x + currentLodStep, bottom_right_z + currentLodStep);
00933                                                         c2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x,                                  bottom_right_z);
00934                                                         while (step < halfsuperstep &&
00935                                                                         !Math::pointInTri2D (pos, a2d, b2d, c2d))
00936                                                         {
00937                                                                 step += currentLodStep;
00938                                                                 
00939                                                                 a2d.x += currentLodStep;
00940                                                                 b2d.x += currentLodStep;
00941                                                         }                       
00942                                                         // middle point
00943                                                         if (step >= halfsuperstep)
00944                                                         {
00945                                                                 c2d.x += neighbour_currentLodStep;
00946                                                                 
00947                                                                 while (step < neighbour_currentLodStep &&
00948                                                                                 !Math::pointInTri2D (pos, a2d, b2d, c2d))
00949                                                                 {
00950                                                                         step += currentLodStep;
00951                                                                 
00952                                                                         a2d.x += currentLodStep;
00953                                                                         b2d.x += currentLodStep;
00954                                                                 }                                                
00955                                                         }                                       
00956                                                 }
00957                                         }
00958                                 }
00959                                 else if (south)
00960                                 {
00961                                         bool not_found = true;
00962                                         if (east)//northeast
00963                                         {                       
00964                                                 #ifdef _DEBUGPOSHEIGHTSTICH     
00965                                                         debugStich += " south: " + StringConverter::toString(r->_getNeighbor(SOUTH)->getRenderLevel()) +
00966                                                                           " east: " + StringConverter::toString(r->_getNeighbor(EAST)->getRenderLevel());
00967                                                 #endif //_DEBUGPOSHEIGHTSTICH
00968                                                         
00969                                                 // neighbour lod spread
00970                                                 const int neighbour_currentLodStep = 1 << r->_getNeighbor(EAST)->getRenderLevel();
00971                                                 // Step half way between low detail steps
00972                                                 const int halfsuperstep = neighbour_currentLodStep >> 1;                                                
00973                                                 const unsigned long neighbour_lod_mask = ~(neighbour_currentLodStep - 1);
00974                                                 bottom_right_z = static_cast<int>(localPageZ) & neighbour_lod_mask;                                     
00975                                                 const unsigned long lod_mask = ~(currentLodStep - 1);
00976                                                 bottom_right_x = static_cast<int>(localPageX) & lod_mask;
00977                                                 
00978                                                 a2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x + currentLodStep, bottom_right_z);
00979                                                 b2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x,                                  bottom_right_z + halfsuperstep);
00980                                                 c2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x + currentLodStep, bottom_right_z + neighbour_currentLodStep);
00981                                                 
00982                                                 // biggest Middle tri
00983                                                 if (!Math::pointInTri2D (pos, a2d, b2d, c2d))
00984                                                 {
00985                                                         // all other smalls tri up to middle
00986                                                         // but omit first triangle
00987                                                         
00988                                                         // omit first tri 
00989                                                         a2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x,                                  bottom_right_z);
00990                                                         b2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x,                                  bottom_right_z + currentLodStep);
00991                                                         c2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x + currentLodStep, bottom_right_z);
00992                                                         
00993                                                         int step = 1;
00994                                                         while (step < halfsuperstep &&
00995                                                                         !Math::pointInTri2D (pos, a2d, b2d, c2d))
00996                                                         {
00997                                                                 step += currentLodStep;
00998                                                                 
00999                                                                 a2d.y += currentLodStep;
01000                                                                 b2d.y += currentLodStep;
01001                                                         }               
01002                                                         // stops here, not looking after middle of higher lod.
01003                                                         // middle point
01004                                                         if (step < halfsuperstep)
01005                                                                 not_found = false;
01006                                                 }
01007                                                 else
01008                                                 {
01009                                                         not_found = false;
01010                                                 }
01011                                                                                         
01012                                         }
01013                                         else if (west)//northwest
01014                                         {                                                                               
01015                                                 #ifdef _DEBUGPOSHEIGHTSTICH     
01016                                                         debugStich += " south: " + StringConverter::toString(r->_getNeighbor(SOUTH)->getRenderLevel()) +
01017                                                                           " west: " + StringConverter::toString(r->_getNeighbor(WEST)->getRenderLevel());       
01018                                                 #endif //_DEBUGPOSHEIGHTSTICH   
01019                                         
01020                                                 // neighbour lod spread
01021                                                 const int neighbour_currentLodStep = 1 << r->_getNeighbor(WEST)->getRenderLevel();
01022                                                 // Step half way between low detail steps
01023                                                 const int halfsuperstep = neighbour_currentLodStep >> 1;                                                
01024                                                 const unsigned long neighbour_lod_mask = ~(neighbour_currentLodStep - 1);                                       
01025                                                 bottom_right_z = static_cast<int>(localPageZ) & neighbour_lod_mask;
01026                                                 const unsigned long lod_mask = ~(currentLodStep - 1);
01027                                                 bottom_right_x = static_cast<int>(localPageX) & lod_mask;
01028                                                 
01029                                                 a2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x,                                  bottom_right_z);
01030                                                 b2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x + currentLodStep, bottom_right_z + halfsuperstep);
01031                                                 c2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x,                                  bottom_right_z + neighbour_currentLodStep);
01032                                                 
01033                                                 // biggest Middle tri
01034                                                 if (!Math::pointInTri2D (pos, a2d, b2d, c2d))
01035                                                 {
01036                                                         //all other small tri
01037                                                         
01038                                                         
01039                                                         a2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x + currentLodStep, bottom_right_z);
01040                                                         b2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x + currentLodStep, bottom_right_z + currentLodStep);
01041                                                         c2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x,                                  bottom_right_z);
01042                                                         
01043                                                         int step = halfsuperstep;
01044                                                         
01045                                                         // begins at middle point
01046                                                         a2d.y += halfsuperstep;
01047                                                         b2d.y += halfsuperstep;
01048                                                         c2d.y += neighbour_currentLodStep;
01049                                                         
01050                                                         while (step < neighbour_currentLodStep &&
01051                                                                         !Math::pointInTri2D (pos, a2d, b2d, c2d))
01052                                                         {
01053                                                                 step += currentLodStep;
01054                                                                 
01055                                                                 a2d.y += currentLodStep;
01056                                                                 b2d.y += currentLodStep;
01057                                                         }
01058                                                         // stops here
01059                                                         if (step < neighbour_currentLodStep)
01060                                                                 not_found = false;      
01061                                                 }
01062                                                 else
01063                                                 {
01064                                                         not_found = false;
01065                                                 }                               
01066                                         }
01067                                         if (not_found)
01068                                         {       
01069                                                 // south
01070                                                 #ifdef _DEBUGPOSHEIGHTSTICH
01071                                                         debugStich += " south: " + StringConverter::toString(r->_getNeighbor(SOUTH)->getRenderLevel());
01072                                                 #endif //_DEBUGPOSHEIGHTSTICH
01073                                                 
01074                                                 // neighbour lod spread
01075                                                 const int neighbour_currentLodStep = 1 << r->_getNeighbor(SOUTH)->getRenderLevel();
01076                                                 // Step half way between low detail steps
01077                                                 const int halfsuperstep = neighbour_currentLodStep >> 1;                                                        
01078                                                 const unsigned long neighbour_lod_mask = ~(neighbour_currentLodStep - 1);                                               
01079                                                 bottom_right_x = static_cast<int>(localPageX) & neighbour_lod_mask;                                             
01080                                                 const unsigned long lod_mask = ~(currentLodStep - 1);
01081                                                 bottom_right_z = static_cast<int>(localPageZ) & lod_mask;
01082                                                 
01083                                                 a2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x,                                                          bottom_right_z + currentLodStep);
01084                                                 b2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x + halfsuperstep,                          bottom_right_z);
01085                                                 c2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x + neighbour_currentLodStep,       bottom_right_z + currentLodStep);
01086                                         
01087                                                 // biggest Middle tri
01088                                                 if (!Math::pointInTri2D (pos, a2d, b2d, c2d))
01089                                                 {
01090                                                         //all other small tri
01091                                                         
01092                                                         // could omit first and last tri ?
01093                                                         int step = 0;
01094                                                         
01095                                                         a2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x,                                  bottom_right_z);
01096                                                         b2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x + currentLodStep, bottom_right_z);
01097                                                         c2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x,                                  bottom_right_z + currentLodStep);
01098                                                         
01099                                                         while (step < halfsuperstep &&
01100                                                                         !Math::pointInTri2D (pos, a2d, b2d, c2d))
01101                                                         {
01102                                                                 step += currentLodStep;
01103                                                                 
01104                                                                 a2d.x += currentLodStep;
01105                                                                 b2d.x += currentLodStep;
01106                                                         }       
01107                                                         // middle point
01108                                                         if (step >= halfsuperstep)
01109                                                         {
01110                                                                 c2d.x += neighbour_currentLodStep;
01111                                                                 
01112                                                                 while (step < neighbour_currentLodStep &&
01113                                                                                 !Math::pointInTri2D (pos, a2d, b2d, c2d))
01114                                                                 {
01115                                                                         step += currentLodStep;
01116                                                                 
01117                                                                         a2d.x += currentLodStep;
01118                                                                         b2d.x += currentLodStep;
01119                                                                 }                                                                                
01120                                                         }                                       
01121                                                 }
01122                                         }
01123                                 }       
01124                                 else if (east) // just east
01125                                 {
01126                                         #ifdef _DEBUGPOSHEIGHTSTICH
01127                                                 debugStich += " east: " + StringConverter::toString(r->_getNeighbor(EAST)->getRenderLevel());
01128                                         #endif //_DEBUGPOSHEIGHTSTICH
01129                                         
01130                                         // neighbour lod spread
01131                                         const int neighbour_currentLodStep = 1 << r->_getNeighbor(EAST)->getRenderLevel();
01132                                         // Step half way between low detail steps
01133                                         const int halfsuperstep = neighbour_currentLodStep >> 1;                                                
01134                                         const unsigned long neighbour_lod_mask = ~(neighbour_currentLodStep - 1);
01135                                         bottom_right_z = static_cast<int>(localPageZ) & neighbour_lod_mask;                                     
01136                                         const unsigned long lod_mask = ~(currentLodStep - 1);
01137                                         bottom_right_x = static_cast<int>(localPageX) & lod_mask;
01138                                         
01139                                         a2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x + currentLodStep,         bottom_right_z);
01140                                         b2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x,                                          bottom_right_z + halfsuperstep);
01141                                         c2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x + currentLodStep,         bottom_right_z + neighbour_currentLodStep);
01142                                         
01143                                         // biggest Middle tri
01144                                         if (!Math::pointInTri2D (pos, a2d, b2d, c2d))
01145                                         {
01146                                                 //all other small tri
01147                                                 a2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x,                                  bottom_right_z);
01148                                                 b2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x,                                  bottom_right_z + currentLodStep);
01149                                                 c2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x + currentLodStep, bottom_right_z);
01150                                                 
01151                                                 int step = 0;
01152                                                 while (step < halfsuperstep &&
01153                                                                 !Math::pointInTri2D (pos, a2d, b2d, c2d))
01154                                                 {
01155                                                         step += currentLodStep;
01156                                                         
01157                                                         a2d.y += currentLodStep;
01158                                                         b2d.y += currentLodStep;
01159                                                 }                       
01160                                                 // middle point
01161                                                 if (step >= halfsuperstep)
01162                                                 {
01163                                                         c2d.y += neighbour_currentLodStep;
01164                                                 
01165                                                         while (step < neighbour_currentLodStep &&
01166                                                                         !Math::pointInTri2D (pos, a2d, b2d, c2d))
01167                                                         {
01168                                                                 step += currentLodStep;
01169                                                                 
01170                                                                 a2d.y += currentLodStep;
01171                                                                 b2d.y += currentLodStep;
01172                                                         }                                                
01173                                                 }       
01174                                         }
01175                                 }
01176                                 else if (west) // just west
01177                                 {
01178                                         #ifdef _DEBUGPOSHEIGHTSTICH
01179                                                 debugStich += " west: " + StringConverter::toString(r->_getNeighbor(WEST)->getRenderLevel());
01180                                         #endif //_DEBUGPOSHEIGHTSTICH
01181                                         
01182                                         // neighbour lod spread
01183                                         const int neighbour_currentLodStep = 1 << r->_getNeighbor(WEST)->getRenderLevel();
01184                                         // Step half way between low detail steps
01185                                         const int halfsuperstep = neighbour_currentLodStep >> 1;                                                
01186                                         const unsigned long neighbour_lod_mask = ~(neighbour_currentLodStep - 1);                                       
01187                                         bottom_right_z = static_cast<int>(localPageZ) & neighbour_lod_mask;
01188                                         const unsigned long lod_mask = ~(currentLodStep - 1);
01189                                         bottom_right_x = static_cast<int>(localPageX) & lod_mask;
01190                                         
01191                                         a2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x,                                  bottom_right_z);
01192                                         b2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x + currentLodStep, bottom_right_z + halfsuperstep);
01193                                         c2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x,                                  bottom_right_z + neighbour_currentLodStep);
01194                                         
01195                                         // biggest Middle tri
01196                                         if (!Math::pointInTri2D (pos, a2d, b2d, c2d))
01197                                         {
01198                                                 //all other small tri
01199                                                 
01200                                                 
01201                                                 a2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x + currentLodStep, bottom_right_z);
01202                                                 b2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x + currentLodStep, bottom_right_z + currentLodStep);
01203                                                 c2d = Vector2 (bottom_right_x,                                  bottom_right_z);
01204                                                 
01205                                                 int step = 0;
01206                                                 while (step < halfsuperstep &&
01207                                                                 !Math::pointInTri2D (pos, a2d, b2d, c2d))
01208                                                 {
01209                                                         step += currentLodStep;
01210                                                         
01211                                                         a2d.y += currentLodStep;
01212                                                         b2d.y += currentLodStep;
01213                                                 }                       
01214                                                 // middle point
01215                                                 if (step >= halfsuperstep)
01216                                                 {
01217                                                         c2d.y += neighbour_currentLodStep;
01218                                                 
01219                                                         while (step < neighbour_currentLodStep &&
01220                                                                         !Math::pointInTri2D (pos, a2d, b2d, c2d))
01221                                                         {
01222                                                                 step += currentLodStep;
01223                                                                 
01224                                                                 a2d.y += currentLodStep;
01225                                                                 b2d.y += currentLodStep;
01226                                                         }                                                
01227                                                 }       
01228                                         }       
01229                                 }                       
01230                                         
01231                                 const Vector3 a (a2d.x, getHeightAtPage (pageNumberX, pageNumberZ, a2d.x, a2d.y), a2d.y);
01232                                 const Vector3 b (b2d.x, getHeightAtPage (pageNumberX, pageNumberZ, b2d.x, b2d.y), b2d.y);
01233                                 const Vector3 c (c2d.x, getHeightAtPage (pageNumberX, pageNumberZ, c2d.x, c2d.y), c2d.y);       
01234                                         
01235                                          
01236                                 #ifdef _DEBUGPOSHEIGHTSTICH     
01237                                          const Real shiftx = pageNumberX*pSize - mOptions->maxUnScaledX;
01238                                          const Real shiftz = pageNumberZ*pSize - mOptions->maxUnScaledZ;
01239                                  
01240                                          const Vector3 A ((a.x + shiftx) * mOptions->scale.x,                                           
01241                                                                            a.y, 
01242                                                                            (a.z  + shiftz) * mOptions->scale.z);
01243                                          const Vector3 B ((b.x + shiftx) * mOptions->scale.x,   
01244                                                                            b.y, 
01245                                                                           (b.z  + shiftz) * mOptions->scale.z);
01246                                          const Vector3 C ((c.x + shiftx) * mOptions->scale.x,                                           
01247                                                                           c.y,  
01248                                                                           (c.z + shiftz) * mOptions->scale.z);
01249                                                                                  
01250                                          static bool debugged_stitch_none = true;
01251                                          
01252                                          static SceneNode* Anode = 0; 
01253                                          static SceneNode* Bnode = 0;
01254                                          static SceneNode* Cnode = 0;
01255                                  
01256                                          if (debugged_stitch_none)
01257                                          {
01258                                                 const String name("TriDebugSphere");
01259                                                 Entity* entity = PagingLandScapeSceneManager::getSingleton().createEntity(name, "sphere.mesh"); 
01260                                                 SceneNode* Rootnode = PagingLandScapeSceneManager::getSingleton().getRootSceneNode();
01261                                     
01262                                                 Entity *e;
01263                                                 Anode = Rootnode->createChildSceneNode(name + "A"); 
01264                                                 e = entity->clone(name + "A");
01265                                                 Anode->attachObject(e); 
01266                                                 Anode->setScale(0.1f, 0.1f, 0.1f);                         
01267                                                 Anode->showBoundingBox(true);
01268                                                 e->getMesh()->getSubMesh(0)->setMaterialName("BaseRedNoLightNoDepthCheck");
01269                                     
01270                                                 Bnode = Rootnode->createChildSceneNode(name + "B"); 
01271                                                 e = entity->clone(name + "B");
01272                                                 Bnode->attachObject(e); 
01273                                                 Bnode->setScale(0.1f, 0.1f, 0.1f);                         
01274                                                 Bnode->showBoundingBox(true);
01275                                                 e->getMesh()->getSubMesh(0)->setMaterialName ("BaseRedNoLightNoDepthCheck");
01276                                     
01277                                     
01278                                                 Cnode = Rootnode->createChildSceneNode(name + "C"); 
01279                                                 e = entity->clone(name + "C");
01280                                                 Cnode->attachObject(e); 
01281                                                 Cnode->setScale(0.1f, 0.1f, 0.1f);                         
01282                                                 Cnode->showBoundingBox(true);
01283                                                 e->getMesh()->getSubMesh(0)->setMaterialName ("BaseRedNoLightNoDepthCheck");
01284                                     
01285                                                 debugged_stitch_none = false;
01286                                         }
01287                                 
01288                                         Anode->setPosition(A); 
01289                                         Bnode->setPosition(B); 
01290                                         Cnode->setPosition(C); 
01291                                         
01292                                 #endif //_DEBUGPOSHEIGHTSTICH   
01293                                 
01294                                         
01295                                 
01296                                 const Ray triIntersect (Vector3(localPageX, getMaxHeight(), localPageZ), Vector3::NEGATIVE_UNIT_Y);
