01297                                 std::pair<bool, Real> res = Math::intersects(triIntersect, a, b, c, true, true);        
01298                                 if (res.first)
01299                                         heightValue = getMaxHeight() - res.second;
01300                                 else
01301                                         heightValue = 0.0f;
01302 
01303             if (getSlopeAt)
01304                {
01305                Vector3 result;
01306                Vector3 vector1;
01307                Vector3 vector2;
01308 
01309                vector1 = a - b;
01310                vector2 = b - c;
01311                result.x = (vector1.y * vector2.z) - (vector1.z * vector2.y);
01312                result.y = (vector1.z * vector2.x) - (vector1.x * vector2.z);
01313                result.z = (vector1.x * vector2.y) - (vector1.y * vector2.x);
01314 
01315 //               result.x = ((top_right_y - top_left_y) * (-mOptions->scale.z));
01316 //               result.y = mOptions->scale.x * (-mOptions->scale.z);
01317 //               result.z = -mOptions->scale.x * (bottom_left_y - top_left_y);
01318 
01319                result.normalise();
01320                *getSlopeAt = 1.0 + result.y;
01321                if (fabs(*getSlopeAt) < 0.001f)
01322                   *getSlopeAt = 0.0f;
01323                }
01324 
01325             return heightValue;
01326                         }
01327                 }
01328                 
01329                 // no stitching, easy life...
01330                 //
01331                 //   TL-----TR 1.0
01332                 //   |     / |
01333                 //   |    /  |  .
01334                 //   |   /   |  .
01335                 //   |  /    |  .   ^
01336                 //   | /     |      |
01337                 //   BL-----BR 0.0  z
01338                 //  1.0 ... 0.0
01339                 //
01340                 //      < - x
01341                 //
01342                 //  Where 1.0 is currentLodStep
01343                 //
01344                 const unsigned long lod_mask = ~(currentLodStep - 1);
01345                 
01346                 const int bottom_right_x = static_cast<int>(localPageX) & lod_mask;
01347                 const int bottom_right_z = static_cast<int>(localPageZ) & lod_mask;
01348                 const int top_right_x = bottom_right_x + currentLodStep; 
01349                 const int top_right_z = bottom_right_z + currentLodStep;
01350                 
01351                 
01352                 #ifdef _DEBUGPOSHEIGHTSTICH     
01353                         if (1)
01354                         {
01355                                 RenderTarget *t = mOptions->primaryCamera->getViewport()->getTarget ();
01356                                 const String Debugtext (debugStich);
01357                                 t->setDebugText (debugStich);
01358                         }
01359                 #endif //_DEBUGPOSHEIGHTSTICH   
01360                         
01361       
01362         // find the 4 heights around the point
01363          const Real bottom_right_y = getHeightAtPage (pageNumberX, pageNumberZ, bottom_right_x , bottom_right_z);
01364          const Real bottom_left_y  = getHeightAtPage (pageNumberX, pageNumberZ, top_right_x,     bottom_right_z);
01365          const Real top_right_y    = getHeightAtPage (pageNumberX, pageNumberZ, bottom_right_x,  top_right_z);
01366          const Real top_left_y     = getHeightAtPage (pageNumberX, pageNumberZ, top_right_x,     top_right_z);
01367                         
01368          
01369                 #ifdef _DEBUGPOSHEIGHTSTICH     
01370                          const Real shiftx = pageNumberX*pSize - mOptions->maxUnScaledX;
01371                          const Real shiftz = pageNumberZ*pSize - mOptions->maxUnScaledZ;
01372                  
01373                          const Vector3 BR((bottom_right_x + shiftx) * mOptions->scale.x,                                                
01374                                                                  bottom_right_y, 
01375                                                                  (bottom_right_z + shiftz) * mOptions->scale.z);
01376                          const Vector3 BL((top_right_x + shiftx) * mOptions->scale.x,   
01377                                                                  bottom_left_y, 
01378                                                                  (bottom_right_z  + shiftz) * mOptions->scale.z);
01379                          const Vector3 TR((bottom_right_x + shiftx) * mOptions->scale.x,                                                
01380                                                                  top_right_y,   
01381                                                                  (top_right_z + shiftz) * mOptions->scale.z);
01382                          const Vector3 TL((top_right_x + shiftx) * mOptions->scale.x,   
01383                                                                  top_left_y,            
01384                                                                  (top_right_z + shiftz) * mOptions->scale.z);
01385                  
01386                          static bool debugged_none = true;
01387                          
01388                          static SceneNode* BRnode = 0; 
01389                          static SceneNode* BLnode = 0;
01390                          static SceneNode* TRnode = 0; 
01391                          static SceneNode* TLnode = 0; 
01392                  
01393                          if (debugged_none)
01394                          {
01395                                 const String name("DebugSphere");
01396                                 Entity* entity = PagingLandScapeSceneManager::getSingleton().createEntity(name, "sphere.mesh"); 
01397                                 SceneNode* Rootnode = PagingLandScapeSceneManager::getSingleton().getRootSceneNode();
01398                      
01399                                 BRnode = Rootnode->createChildSceneNode(name + "BR"); 
01400                                 BRnode->attachObject(entity->clone(name + "BR")); 
01401                                 BRnode->setScale(0.1f, 0.1f, 0.1f);                         
01402                                 BRnode->showBoundingBox(true);
01403                     
01404                                 BLnode = Rootnode->createChildSceneNode(name + "BL"); 
01405                                 BLnode->attachObject(entity->clone(name + "BL")); 
01406                                 BLnode->setScale(0.1f, 0.1f, 0.1f);                         
01407                                 BLnode->showBoundingBox(true);
01408                     
01409                     
01410                                 TRnode = Rootnode->createChildSceneNode(name + "TR"); 
01411                                 TRnode->attachObject(entity->clone(name + "TR")); 
01412                                 TRnode->setScale(0.1f, 0.1f, 0.1f);                         
01413                                 TRnode->showBoundingBox(true);
01414                     
01415                                 TLnode = Rootnode->createChildSceneNode(name + "TL"); 
01416                                 TLnode->attachObject(entity->clone(name + "TL")); 
01417                                 TLnode->setScale(0.1f, 0.1f, 0.1f);                         
01418                                 TLnode->showBoundingBox(true);
01419                     
01420                                 debugged_none = false;
01421                         }
01422                 
01423                         BRnode->setPosition(BR); 
01424                         BLnode->setPosition(BL); 
01425                         TRnode->setPosition(TR); 
01426                         TLnode->setPosition(TL); 
01427                         
01428                         if (0)
01429                         {
01430                                 RenderTarget *t = mOptions->primaryCamera->getViewport()->getTarget ();
01431                                 const String Debugtext ("(X= " +  StringConverter::toString(localPageX) + " Z=" +
01432                                                                 StringConverter::toString(localPageZ) + "), (br_x=" +
01433                                                                 StringConverter::toString(bottom_right_x) + ", br_z=" +
01434                                                                 StringConverter::toString(bottom_right_z) + ") & spread=" +
01435                                                                 StringConverter::toString(currentLodStep)+ ") & lod=" +
01436                                                                 StringConverter::toString(currentRenderLevel));
01437                                 t->setDebugText(Debugtext);
01438                         }
01439             #endif //_DEBUGPOSHEIGHTSTICH       
01440         
01441         const Real z_pct = (localPageZ - bottom_right_z) * inv_currentLodStep;
01442         Real x_pct = (localPageX - bottom_right_x) * inv_currentLodStep;
01443  
01444          if (x_pct > 1 - z_pct)
01445          { 
01446             // This point is on the upper-left tri
01447              const Real y1 = bottom_left_y * (1-z_pct) + top_left_y  * z_pct;
01448              const Real y2 = bottom_left_y * (1-z_pct) + top_right_y * z_pct;
01449               if (z_pct > 0.0f)
01450                  x_pct = (x_pct - (1-z_pct)) / z_pct;
01451 
01452               if (getSlopeAt)
01453               {
01454                  Vector3 result(((top_right_y - top_left_y) * (-mOptions->scale.z)),
01455                                  mOptions->scale.x * (-mOptions->scale.z),
01456                                  -mOptions->scale.x * (bottom_left_y - top_left_y));
01457                  result.normalise();
01458                  *getSlopeAt = 1.0 + result.y;
01459                  if (fabs(*getSlopeAt) < 0.001f)
01460                     *getSlopeAt = 0.0f;
01461                }
01462 
01463              return y1 * x_pct + y2 * (1-x_pct);
01464          } // if (x_pct > 1 - z_pct)
01465          else
01466          { 
01467             // This point is on the lower-right tri
01468              const Real y1 = bottom_left_y  * (1-z_pct) + top_right_y * z_pct;
01469              const Real y2 = bottom_right_y * (1-z_pct) + top_right_y * z_pct;
01470 
01471              if (z_pct < 1.0f)
01472                  x_pct = x_pct / (1-z_pct);
01473 
01474              if (getSlopeAt)
01475             {
01476                 Vector3 result((bottom_left_y - bottom_right_y) * mOptions->scale.z,
01477                                 -mOptions->scale.x * mOptions->scale.z,
01478                                  mOptions->scale.x * (top_right_y - bottom_right_y));
01479                 result.normalise();
01480                 *getSlopeAt = 1.0 + result.y;
01481                 if (fabs(*getSlopeAt) < 0.001f)
01482                    *getSlopeAt = 0.0f;
01483             }
01484 
01485              return y1 * x_pct + y2 * (1-x_pct);
01486          } 
01487 
01488 #else //_MAPSPLITTER
01489         return 0.0f;
01490 #endif //_MAPSPLITTER
01491     }
01492     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01493     const Real PagingLandScapeData2DManager::getWorldHeight(const Real x, const Real z)
01494     {
01495 #ifndef _MAPSPLITTER
01496             // figure out which page the point is on
01497         unsigned int pageX, pageZ;
01498         if (mPageManager->getPageIndices(x, z, pageX, pageZ, false))
01499                 {
01500                         PagingLandScapeData2D *data = getData2D (pageX, pageZ, false);
01501                         if (data && data->isLoaded())
01502             {
01503                 // scale position from world to page scale
01504                 Real localX = x / mOptions->scale.x;
01505                 Real localZ = z / mOptions->scale.z;
01506 
01507                 // adjust x and z to be local to page
01508                 const Real pSize = mOptions->PageSize - 1;
01509 
01510                 localX -= pageX*pSize - mOptions->maxUnScaledX;
01511                 localZ -= pageZ*pSize - mOptions->maxUnScaledZ;
01512 
01513                 return getHeightAtPage (pageX, pageZ, static_cast<int> (localX), static_cast<int> (localZ));   
01514             }
01515         }
01516 
01517 #endif //_MAPSPLITTER
01518         return 0.0f;
01519     }
01520     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01521     const Real PagingLandScapeData2DManager::getHeightAtPage(const unsigned int dataX, const unsigned int dataZ, 
01522                                                         const Real x, const Real z) 
01523     {
01524         PagingLandScapeData2D* data = getData2D (dataX, dataZ, false );
01525         if (data && data->isLoaded())
01526         {
01527             Real lX = x;
01528             Real lZ = z;
01529             const Real pSize = mOptions->PageSize - 1;
01530                         PagingLandScapeData2D* srcdata = data;
01531             //check if we have to change current page
01532             if (lX < 0.0f)
01533             { 
01534                 if (dataX == 0)
01535                     lX = 0.0f;
01536                 else
01537                 {
01538                                         data = getData2D (dataX - 1 , dataZ, false );
01539                                         if (data && data->isLoaded())
01540                     {
01541                         lX = static_cast<Real> (pSize);
01542                     }
01543                     else
01544                     {
01545                         lX = 0.0f;
01546                         data = srcdata;
01547                     }
01548                 }
01549               
01550             }
01551             else if (lX > pSize)
01552             {
01553                 if (dataX == mOptions->world_width - 1)
01554                     lX = static_cast<Real> (pSize);
01555                 else
01556                                 {
01557                                         data = getData2D (dataX + 1 , dataZ, false );
01558                                         if (data && data->isLoaded())
01559                     {
01560                         lX = 0.0f;
01561                     }
01562                     else
01563                     {
01564                         lX = static_cast<Real> (pSize);
01565                         data = srcdata;
01566                     }
01567                 }
01568             }
01569 
01570             if (lZ < 0.0f)
01571             {
01572                 if (dataZ == 0)
01573                     lZ = 0.0f;
01574                 else
01575                                 {
01576                                         data = getData2D (dataX, dataZ - 1, false );
01577                                         if (data && data->isLoaded())
01578                     {
01579                         lZ = static_cast<Real> (pSize);
01580                     }
01581                     else
01582                     {
01583                         lZ = 0.0f;
01584                         data = srcdata;
01585                     }
01586                 }
01587             }
01588             else if (lZ > pSize)
01589             {
01590                 if (dataZ == mOptions->world_height - 1)
01591                     lZ = static_cast<Real> (pSize);
01592                 else
01593                                 {
01594                                         data = getData2D (dataX, dataZ + 1, false );
01595                                         if (data && data->isLoaded())
01596                     {
01597                         lZ = 0.0f;
01598                     }
01599                     else
01600                     {
01601                         lZ = static_cast<Real> (pSize);
01602                         data = srcdata;
01603                     }
01604                 }
01605             }
01606             assert (data);
01607             return data->getHeight (lX, lZ);
01608         }
01609         return 0.0f;
01610     }
01611     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01612     const Real PagingLandScapeData2DManager::getHeightAtPage(const unsigned int dataX, const unsigned int dataZ, 
01613                                                         const int x, const int z) 
01614     {
01615                 PagingLandScapeData2D* data = getData2D (dataX, dataZ, false );
01616                 if (data && data->isLoaded())
01617         {
01618             int lX = x;
01619             int lZ = z;
01620                         const int pSize = mOptions->PageSize - 1;
01621                         PagingLandScapeData2D* srcdata = data;
01622             //check if we have to change current page
01623             if (lX < 0)
01624             { 
01625                 if (dataX == 0)
01626                     lX = 0;
01627                 else
01628                                 {
01629                                         data = getData2D (dataX - 1,  dataZ, false );
01630                                         if (data && data->isLoaded())
01631                     {
01632                         lX = pSize;
01633                     }
01634                     else
01635                     {
01636                         lX = 0;
01637                         data = srcdata;
01638                     }
01639                 }
01640               
01641             }
01642             else if (lX > pSize)
01643             {
01644                 if (dataX == mOptions->world_width - 1)
01645                     lX = pSize;
01646                 else
01647                                 {
01648                                         data = getData2D (dataX + 1,  dataZ, false );
01649                                         if (data && data->isLoaded())
01650                     {
01651                         lX = 0;
01652                     }
01653                     else
01654                     {
01655                         lX = pSize;
01656                         data = srcdata;
01657                     }
01658                 }
01659             }
01660 
01661             if (lZ < 0)
01662             {
01663                 if (dataZ == 0)
01664                     lZ = 0;
01665                 else
01666                                 {
01667                                         data = getData2D (dataX,  dataZ - 1, false );
01668                                         if (data && data->isLoaded())
01669                     {
01670                         lZ = pSize;
01671                     }
01672                     else
01673                     {
01674                         lZ = 0;
01675                         data = srcdata;
01676                     }
01677                 }
01678             }
01679             else if (lZ > pSize)
01680             {
01681                 if (dataZ == mOptions->world_height - 1)
01682                     lZ = pSize;
01683                 else
01684                                 {
01685                                         data = getData2D (dataX,  dataZ + 1, false );
01686                                         if (data && data->isLoaded())
01687                     {
01688                         lZ = 0;
01689                     }
01690                     else
01691                     {
01692                         lZ = pSize;
01693                         data = srcdata;
01694                     }
01695                 }
01696             }
01697             assert (data);
01698             return data->getHeight (lX, lZ);
01699         }
01700         else
01701         {
01702             // not a border demand and we do not have the data.
01703             return 0.0f;
01704         }  
01705     }
01706 
01707 
01708     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01709     const Vector3 PagingLandScapeData2DManager::getNormalAt(const unsigned int dataX, const unsigned int dataZ, 
01710                                                             const unsigned int x, const unsigned int z)
01711     {
01712                 PagingLandScapeData2D* data = getData2D (dataX,  dataZ, false );
01713                 if (data && data->isLoaded())
01714             {
01715             #ifdef _LOADEDNORM  
01716                 // not as precise (rgb normals gives 8 bits precision Real)
01717                 // and finally nearly as fast.
01718                 return data->getNormalAt (x, z);
01719             #else /*_LOADEDNORM*/
01720             {
01721                 // First General method : (9 adds and 6 muls + a normalization)
01722                 //        *---v3--*
01723                 //        |   |   |
01724                 //        |   |   |
01725                 //        v1--X--v2
01726                 //        |   |   |
01727                 //        |   |   |
01728                 //        *---v4--*
01729                 //
01730                 //        U = v2 - v1;
01731                 //        V = v4 - v3;
01732                 //        N = Cross(U, V);
01733                 //        N.normalise;
01734                 //
01735                 // BUT IN CASE OF A HEIGHTMAP : 
01736                 //
01737                 //   if you do some math by hand before you code, 
01738                 //   you can see that N is immediately given by 
01739                 //  Approximation (2 adds and a normalization)
01740                 // 
01741                 //        N = Vector3(z[x-1][y] - z[x+1][y], z[x][y-1] - z[x][y+1], 2); 
01742                 //        N.normalise();
01743                 //
01744                 // or even using SOBEL operator VERY accurate! 
01745                 // (14 adds and a normalization)
01746                 //
01747                 //       N = Vector3 (z[x-1][y-1] + z[x-1][y] + z[x-1][y] + z[x-1][y+1] - z[x+1][y-1] - z[x+1][y] - z[x+1][y] - z[x+1][y+1], 
01748                 //                     z[x-1][y-1] + z[x][y-1] + z[x][y-1] + z[x+1][y-1] - z[x-1][y+1] - z[x][y+1] - z[x][y+1] - z[x+1][y+1], 
01749                 //                     8);
01750                 //       N.normalize();
01751 
01752             
01753                 // Fast SOBEL filter
01754 
01755                 // the divider make sure we do respect proportion  (height and width proportional to y)
01756                 const Real Divider = static_cast <Real> (mOptions->PageSize - 1) / mOptions->scale.y;
01757 
01758                 #define  gH(a, b) (getHeightAtPage(dataX, dataZ, static_cast<int> (a), static_cast<int> (b)))
01759 
01760 //              Vector3 result ((gH(x-1,z-1) + gH (x-1, z) + gH (x-1, z) + gH (x-1, z+1) - gH (x+1, z-1) - gH (x+1, z) - gH (x+1, z) - gH (x+1, z+1)) * Divider, 
01761 //                              8.0f, 
01762 //                              (gH (x-1, z-1) + gH (x, z-1) + gH (x, z-1) + gH (x+1, z-1) - gH (x-1, z+1) - gH (x, z+1) - gH (x, z+1) - gH (x+1, z+1)) * Divider);
01763 
01764                 Vector3 result((gH (x - 1 , z)     - gH (x + 1 , z)) * Divider,
01765                                 2.0f,
01766                                (gH (x,         z - 1) - gH (x        , z + 1)) * Divider); 
01767 
01768                 result.normalise ();
01769 
01770                 return result;
01771             }
01772             #endif //_NOLOAD
01773             }
01774             return Vector3::UNIT_Y;
01775     }
01776     //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01777     const Real PagingLandScapeData2DManager::getRealWorldSlope(const Real x, const Real z)
01778     {
01779 #ifndef _MAPSPLITTER
01780         // figure out which page the point is on
01781         const Vector3 pos(x, 0, z);
01782         unsigned int pageX, pageZ;
01783         if (mPageManager->getPageIndices(pos.x, pos.z, pageX, pageZ, false))
01784         {
01785 
01786                         PagingLandScapeData2D* data = getData2D (pageX,  pageZ, false);
01787                         if (data && data->isLoaded())
01788             {
01789                 // figure out which tile the point is on
01790                 PagingLandScapeTile *t = mPageManager->getTile(pos.x, pos.z, 
01791                                                                 pageX, pageZ, 
01792                                                                 false);
01793                 unsigned int Lod = 0;
01794                 if (t && t->isLoaded())
01795                     Lod = t->getRenderable()->getRenderLevel();
01796                 const Vector3 normalVector = getNormalAt(pageX, pageZ, x, z, Lod);
01797                 const Real slope = 1.0f + normalVector.y;
01798                 if (slope < 0.001f)
01799                     return 0.0f;
01800                 else
01801                     return slope;
01802             }
01803         }
01804 #endif //_MAPSPLITTER
01805         return 0.0f;
01806     }
01807 
01808     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01809     const Vector3 PagingLandScapeData2DManager::getNormalAt(const unsigned int pageX, const unsigned int pageZ, const unsigned int x, const unsigned int z, const unsigned int Lod)
01810     {
01811         Vector3  result;
01812 
01813         // scale position from world to page scale
01814         Real localX = x / mOptions->scale.x;
01815         Real localZ = z / mOptions->scale.z;
01816 
01817         // adjust x and z to be local to page
01818         const Real pSize = mOptions->PageSize - 1;
01819 
01820         localX -= pageX * pSize - mOptions->maxUnScaledX;
01821         localZ -= pageZ * pSize - mOptions->maxUnScaledZ;
01822 
01823         // make sure x and z do not go outside the world boundaries
01824         if (localX < 0)
01825             localX = 0;
01826         else if (localX >= pSize) 
01827             localX = pSize - 1;
01828 
01829         if (localZ < 0)
01830             localZ = 0;
01831         else if (localZ >= pSize)
01832             localZ = pSize - 1;
01833 
01834         // find the 4 vertices that surround the point
01835         // use LOD info to determine vertex data spacing - this is passed into the method
01836         // determine vertices on left and right of point and top and bottom
01837         // don't access VBO since a big performance hit when only 4 vertices are needed
01838         const int currentLodStep = 1 << Lod;
01839         const Real inv_currentLodStep =  1.0f / currentLodStep;
01840 
01841         // find the vertex to the 'bottom right' of the point
01842         const unsigned long lod_mask = ~(currentLodStep - 1);
01843         const int bottom_right_x = static_cast<int>(localX) & lod_mask;
01844         const int bottom_right_z = static_cast<int>(localZ) & lod_mask; 
01845 
01846         // find the 4 heights around the point
01847         const Real bottom_right_y = getHeightAtPage(pageX, pageZ, bottom_right_x ,                bottom_right_z);
01848         const Real bottom_left_y  = getHeightAtPage(pageX, pageZ, bottom_right_x + currentLodStep, bottom_right_z);
01849         const Real top_right_y    = getHeightAtPage(pageX, pageZ, bottom_right_x,                 bottom_right_z + currentLodStep);
01850         const Real top_left_y     = getHeightAtPage(pageX, pageZ, bottom_right_x + currentLodStep, bottom_right_z + currentLodStep);
01851 
01852         const Real z_pct = (localZ - bottom_right_z) * inv_currentLodStep;
01853         Real x_pct = (localX - bottom_right_x) * inv_currentLodStep;
01854         //   TL-----TR 1.0
01855         //   |     / |
01856         //   |    /  |  .
01857         //   |   /   |  .
01858         //   |  /    |  .   ^
01859         //   | /     |      |
01860         //   BL-----BR 0.0  z
01861         //  1.0 ... 0.0
01862         //
01863         //      < - x
01864 
01865         if (x_pct > 1 - z_pct)
01866             {
01867             // This point is on the upper-left tri
01868             /*
01869             Vector3 vector1;
01870             Vector3 vector2;
01871 
01872             vector1.x = -mOptions->scale.x;
01873             vector1.y = top_right_y - top_left_y;
01874             vector1.z = 0;
01875             vector2.x = 0;
01876             vector2.y = bottom_left_y - top_left_y;
01877             vector2.z = -mOptions->scale.z;
01878 
01879             result.x = (vector1.y * vector2.z) - (vector1.z * vector2.y);
01880             result.y = (vector1.z * vector2.x) - (vector1.x * vector2.z);
01881             result.z = (vector1.x * vector2.y) - (vector1.y * vector2.x);
01882             */
01883             // The formulas for calculating result are simplified from the above
01884             // commented-out code for computing the cross product.
01885             result.x = ((top_right_y - top_left_y) * (-mOptions->scale.z));
01886             result.y = mOptions->scale.x * (-mOptions->scale.z);
01887             result.z = -mOptions->scale.x * (bottom_left_y - top_left_y);
01888             }
01889         else
01890             {
01891             // This point is on the lower-right tri
01892             /*
01893             Vector3 vector1;
01894             Vector3 vector2;
01895 
01896             vector1.x = mOptions->scale.x;
01897             vector1.y = bottom_left_y - bottom_right_y;
01898             vector1.z = 0;
01899             vector2.x = 0;
01900             vector2.y = top_right_y - bottom_right_y;
01901             vector2.z = mOptions->scale.z;
01902 
01903             result.x = (vector1.y * vector2.z) - (vector1.z * vector2.y);
01904             result.y = (vector1.z * vector2.x) - (vector1.x * vector2.z);
01905             result.z = (vector1.x * vector2.y) - (vector1.y * vector2.x);
01906             */
01907             // The formulas for calculating result are simplified from the above
01908             // commented-out code for computing the cross product.
01909             result.x = (bottom_left_y - bottom_right_y) * mOptions->scale.z;
01910             result.y = -mOptions->scale.x * mOptions->scale.z;
01911             result.z = mOptions->scale.x * (top_right_y - bottom_right_y);
01912             }
01913 
01914         result.normalise();
01915         return result;
01916       }
01917     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------  
01918     Real PagingLandScapeData2DManager::getMaxSlope(Vector3 location1, Vector3 location2, Real maxSlopeIn)
01919     {
01920         int      testCount;
01921         int      testIndex;
01922         Real     maxSlope;
01923         Real     nextSlope;
01924         Vector3  unitVector;
01925         Vector3  iterationOffset;
01926         Vector3  nextLocation;
01927         Real     halfWorldSizeX;
01928         Real     halfWorldSizeZ;
01929         Real     distBetweenPoints;
01930 
01931         //      worldSizeX = (float)mOptions->world_width * mOptions->scale.x;
01932         //      worldSizeZ = (float)mOptions->world_height * mOptions->scale.z;
01933         halfWorldSizeX = mOptions->maxScaledX;
01934         halfWorldSizeZ = mOptions->maxScaledZ;
01935 
01936         if ((location1[0] > halfWorldSizeX) || (location1[2] > halfWorldSizeZ) || 
01937             (location2[0] > halfWorldSizeX) || (location2[2] > halfWorldSizeZ) ||
01938             (location1[0] < -halfWorldSizeX) || (location1[2] < -halfWorldSizeZ) || 
01939             (location2[0] < -halfWorldSizeX) || (location2[2] < -halfWorldSizeZ))
01940         {
01941             // One or both endpoints is off the edge of the world.  Return max slope.
01942             return 1.0f;
01943         }
01944 
01945         getInterpolatedWorldHeight(location2.x, location2.z, &maxSlope);
01946 //        maxSlope = getRealWorldSlope(location2.x, location2.z);
01947         if (maxSlope > maxSlopeIn)
01948             return maxSlope;
01949 
01950         unitVector.x = location2.x - location1.x;
01951         unitVector.y = 0.0f;
01952         unitVector.z = location2.z - location1.z;
01953 
01954         // before normalizing our unitVector, calculate the distance between the endpoints
01955         distBetweenPoints = (Real)sqrt((unitVector.x * unitVector.x) + (unitVector.z * unitVector.z));
01956 //        testCount = (int)(distSquared / (mOptions->scale.x * mOptions->scale.x) / 16.0f);
01957         testCount = (int)((distBetweenPoints / mOptions->scale.x) * 4.0f);
01958 
01959         unitVector.normalise();
01960         iterationOffset.x = unitVector.x * (mOptions->scale.x / 4.0f);
01961         iterationOffset.z = unitVector.z * (mOptions->scale.z / 4.0f);
01962 
01963         nextLocation.x = location1.x;
01964         nextLocation.y = location1.y;
01965         nextLocation.z = location1.z;
01966 
01967         for (testIndex = 0; testIndex < testCount; testIndex++)
01968         {
01969             getInterpolatedWorldHeight(nextLocation.x, nextLocation.z, &nextSlope);
01970 //            nextSlope = getRealWorldSlope(nextLocation.x, nextLocation.z);
01971             if (nextSlope > maxSlopeIn)
01972                 return nextSlope;
01973 
01974             if (nextSlope > maxSlope)
01975                 maxSlope = nextSlope;
01976 
01977             nextLocation.x += iterationOffset.x;
01978             nextLocation.z += iterationOffset.z;
01979         }
01980 
01981         return maxSlope;
01982     }
